description: Resource offering this capability or service
Type(s) of service offered (e.g. microbiome analysis, sample processing)
Short name for the service, if applicable
Full description of the service (preferably in English)
Name of the device(s), in case usage of these is part of the service
Name of a software system or platform, if important for the device characteristics
Technology Readiness Level - an indication of service maturity based on self-assessment
Description of the access policy of the service
Link to the service access policy
Unit used in calculations for costs of service provision
The standards and/or technical specifications that the service is certified or accredited for
